movies.title: Wei ai zhi jian ru jia jing
movies.plot: The story is about 3 young men going after their dream in the movie business in China for a big investment. It reveals the difficulty and despair to get an opportunity there. In the meantime, to get relax from the work of script writing, one of them met a girl through mobile app and start a complicate relationship with her.
movies.simplePlot: The story is about 3 young men going after their dream in the movie business in China for a big investment. It reveals the difficulty and despair to get an opportunity there. In the ...

biography.bio: Angela Yeung Wing, also known by her stage name Angelababy, has made a career in Hong Kong as an actress and a model. Born in Shanghai to her half-Chinese, half-German father and Chinese mother, she moved to Hong Kong at thirteen years old and took her stage name Angelababy as a composition of her legal given name Angela and her family given nickname "Baby".
biography.name: Angelababy

biography.bio: He Chen was born on November 9, 1985 in Fujian, China. He is an actor, known for Detective Chinatown (2015), Back in Time (2014) and Wei ai zhi jian ru jia jing (2014).
biography.name: He Chen

biography.bio: Luyi Zhang was born on June 7, 1980 in Beijing, China. He is an actor, known for The Devotion of Suspect X (2017), The Golden Era (2014) and Wei ai zhi jian ru jia jing (2014).
biography.name: Luyi Zhang

biography.bio: Lu Cao is known for his work on Wei ai zhi jian ru jia jing (2014) and Blind Mountain (2007).
biography.name: Lu Cao

biography.bio: Ruijia Jiang was born on March 8, 1991 in Jinan, Shandong, China. She is an actress, known for Wei ai zhi jian ru jia jing (2014), Where the Wind Settles (2015) and Sous l'aubépine (2010).
biography.name: Ruijia Jiang

biography.bio: Sally Victoria Benson is an Australian Born Actress who usually acts in Chinese Movies and Tv serials speaking Mandarin. Recently in 2012, she was given the opportunity to travel to Romania and film her first lead role, an English-speaking role. She has been based in Beijing since 2008 and speaks Fluent Mandarin Chinese. While studying for a Journalism Degree and Acting Diploma, Sally Victoria also undertook acting classes at the Actors Centre Sydney, National Institute of Dramatic Art and On Camera Connections in Sydney, Australia. After graduating, She headed over to China ready to take on the Industry. With a western appearance and Asian language skills, She is in high demand for Chinese roles. However with the influx of co-production now coming over to film in China, She is hopeful of landing a role in a Hollywood film sometime in the near future.
biography.name: Sally Victoria Benson

biography.bio: Wenli Jiang was born on June 20, 1969 in Bengbu, Anhui, China. She is an actress and producer, known for Farewell My Concubine (1993), The Final Master (2015) and L'amour éternel (2011). She has been married to Changwei Gu since 1993. They have one child.
biography.name: Wenli Jiang

biography.bio: Wu Jiang was born on November 14, 1967 in Tangshan, China. He is an actor, known for A Touch of Sin (2013), To Live (1994) and Dragon (2011).
biography.name: Wu Jiang

biography.bio: Hao Ju is an actor, known for Bei kao bei, lian dui lian (1994), Da zuo deng xiang you zhuan (1996) and Beginning of the Great Revival (2011).
biography.name: Hao Ju

biography.bio: Mao is one of the most well-known singer in China whose first single was released in 1986. Her hot hits include "Ke Wang(Desire)" for the TV series "Ke wang" (1990), "Nuo Yan (Our Promise)" for the TV series "Wo ai wo jia" (1993-1994) etc. Her voice also be soundtrack for many other television programs and movies, and she played a role in the movie Feng kuang ge nu (1988).
biography.name: Amin Mao

biography.bio: Song Dongye is a folk singer, composer and actor, who graduated from Beijing City University, majored in book publication. Song appeared as an independent musician at www.douban.com in 2009, and signed to Modernsky Entertainment CO.,LTD. He has released his first album "Anhe Bridge North" in 2013. Song got married at Aug 9th, 2016.
biography.name: Dongye Song

biography.bio: Dawei Tong was born on February 3, 1979 in Fushun, Liaoning Province, China. He is an actor, known for Sacrifices of War (2011), Red Cliff (2008) and American Dreams in China (2013).
biography.name: Dawei Tong

biography.bio: Yanni Tu is an actress, known for Wei ai zhi jian ru jia jing (2014).
biography.name: Yanni Tu

biography.bio: Baoqiang Wang was born on April 29, 1984 in Hebei, China. He is an actor and director, known for A Touch of Sin (2013), Kung Fu Killer (2014) and Blind Shaft (2003).
biography.name: Baoqiang Wang

biography.bio: Ji Wang is an actress, known for The Karate Kid (2010), Hong fen (1995) and A Native of Beijing in New York (1993).
biography.name: Ji Wang
